member.summary: A custom DataTemplateSelector that selects a DataTemplate based on the Category of a card item.

member.summary: Gets or sets the DataTemplate used for items with the "Ready to Delivery" category.

member.summary: Gets or sets the DataTemplate used for items with the "Menu" category.

member.name: P:syncfusion.kanbandemos.wpf.CardTemplateSelector.ReadyToServeCardTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the DataTemplate used for items with the "Ready to Serve" category.

member.name: P:syncfusion.kanbandemos.wpf.CardTemplateSelector.OrderCardTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the DataTemplate used for items with the "Order" category.

member.name: P:syncfusion.kanbandemos.wpf.CardTemplateSelector.ToDoTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the DataTemplate used for items with the "Open" category.

member.name: P:syncfusion.kanbandemos.wpf.CardTemplateSelector.InProgressTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the DataTemplate used for items with the "In Progress" category.

member.name: P:syncfusion.kanbandemos.wpf.CardTemplateSelector.ReviewTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the DataTemplate used for items with the "Code Review" category.

member.name: P:syncfusion.kanbandemos.wpf.CardTemplateSelector.DoneTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the DataTemplate used for items with the "Done" category.

member.name: M:syncfusion.kanbandemos.wpf.CardTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate(System.Object,System.Windows.DependencyObject)
member.summary: Selects a DataTemplate based on the Category property of the MenuItem. Returns the appropriate template or falls back to the base implementation if no match is found.
member.param: The data object to evaluate for template selection.
The container in which the template will be applied.
member.returns: A DataTemplate corresponding to the item's category.

member.name: T:syncfusion.kanbandemos.wpf.IndicatorColorConverter
member.summary: Converts priority level strings to corresponding color brushes for UI display.

member.name: M:syncfusion.kanbandemos.wpf.IndicatorColorConverter.Convert(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Converts a string value representing a priority level into a color code or brush for UI display.
member.param: The priority level as a string (e.g., "High", "Low").
The target type of the binding (typically a Brush or Color).
An optional parameter for the converter (not used).
The culture information for the conversion (not used).
member.returns: A color code string or a based on the priority level.

member.name: M:syncfusion.kanbandemos.wpf.IndicatorColorConverter.ConvertBack(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Converts a color value back to its corresponding priority string.
member.param: The target type of the conversion.
An optional parameter for the converter.
The culture information for the conversion (not used).
